EmailTemplate.name: Drip App Out
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval for Business Financing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings,
I wanted to touch base and let you know that we still have your pre-approved funding account active and ready to transfer. I previously sent you an application to complete and submit with the necessary documentation.
I am your assigned account representative and will walk you through the application process to ensure that you get the funding your business needs.
Please feel free to contact me at {!Account.OwnerPhone} or just reply to this email with any questions you may have.
Thanks!
Sincerely,
{!Account.OwnerFullName} Senior Account Executive
